description: A registered sex offender was busted by Long Island police after he arranged a date with a 14-year-old boy through a phone app and got naked in a car parked in a mall parking lot.
title: Long Island sex offender busted for getting naked with 14-year-old boy
title_page: Long Island sex offender busted for getting naked with 14-year-old boy | Daily Mail Online
text:
Kieran Bunce, 48, was arrested for criminal sex acts
A registered sex offender was busted by Long Island police after he arranged a date with a 14-year-old boy through a phone app and got naked in a car in a mall parking lot.
A Suffolk County police officer discovered the lewd act while on routine patrol near the Fort Salonga Shopping Center just after midnight Thursday.
As the officer approached a car parked in a dark parking lot, he saw two naked men inside, police wrote in a press release.
After running a background check the cop found out the older of the two, Kieran Bunce, 48, was a registered sex offender. The younger individual was only 14 years old, police said.
Police said Bunce and the boy had arranged their meeting via a cell phone app, but would not say which app was used.
Bunce, who was the owner of the car, was booked on two felony counts of criminal sex act in the second degree, and a misdemeanor count of endangering the welfare of a child.
He will be arraigned Friday at First District Court in Central Islip.
